review.headline_rewrite: Oval Projects Engineering IPO allotment to be out soon: Here are steps to check status online, GMP
bullets: Oval Projects Engineering IPO allotment to be out soon.
The allotment for the Oval Projects Engineering IPO is expected to be finalized on September 2, 2025.
The Oval Projects Engineering IPO will list on BSE SME, with a tentative listing date of September 4, 2025.

item.title: India’s ageing wind infra has potential to unlock 25.4 GW capacity

review.headline_rewrite: India’s ageing wind infra has potential to unlock 25.4 GW capacity
bullets: The Centre for Science and Environment’s (CSE) in a report explored the urgent need to repower, replace old, low-capacity turbines with modern, high-capacity ones,
It highlights structural barriers that hinder repowering, from fragmented ownership to outdated evacuation systems, and calls for a coordinated, policy-backed response.
The report underscores that without targeted policy support, financial incentives, and regulatory reforms, developers are unlikely to independently pursue repowering initiatives.
Tamil Nadu alone operates more than 8,800 turbines totalling 6.25 GW, many of which rely on obsolete technology.
